pages.text: Now we need an $(item)oil mill$() to produce $(item)canola oil$() out of the crops. $(br2)The mill requires energy from a $(item)dynamo$() with a $(item)crank$(). $(thing)Connect the dynamo and the mill with a $(item)cable.$()$(br2) To operate the $(item)dynamo$(), place the $(item)crank$() on top of the $(item)dynamo block$() and right-click it to produce electricity.

$(br2)Now you can produce $(item)canola oil$(). The mill will collect the oil.  You will also get $(item)canola cake$() as a byproduct, which can be used to breed all $(thing)animals$() that can be bred with $(item)wheat$().
As you progress, you can use a $(item)generator$(), which is far more efficient but requires a $(item)tank$() with $(thing)fuel$() and an $(item)engine$() to operate.
